P

PasswordInconsistentException - Exception Class in controller
PasswordInconsistentException extends our custom ValidatioNException, this exception is thrown when the user attempts to change password, but the new password and confirm password fields do not match, or if the user does not input the correct old password
PasswordInconsistentException() - Constructor for exception class controller.PasswordInconsistentException
Default Constructor for PasswordInconsistentException
PasswordInconsistentException(String) - Constructor for exception class controller.PasswordInconsistentException
Constructs a new PasswordInconsistentException with a more detailed error message
Payment - Class in model
The Payment class contains all information for a payment that is placed by a customer when making an order The Payment class holds the cardNumber, expiryDate, cvv, totalPrice
Payment() - Constructor for class model.Payment
Default constructor
Payment(String, String, String, double) - Constructor for class model.Payment
Constructor for creating a new Payment object with details for inserting into DB
PaymentPanel - Class in view
The PaymentPanel extends JPanel, it holds the form details for making a payment This includes JComboBoxes for the expiry date fields, JTexfields for the remaining info This panel makes use of a GridBagLayout
PaymentPanel(Order, Cart) - Constructor for class view.PaymentPanel
Constructor for the PaymentPanel, which builds the form for displaying
Plant - Class in model
The Accessory class is a sublclass of the Item class.
Plant() - Constructor for class model.Plant
Default Constructor
Plant(int, String, String, double, int, String) - Constructor for class model.Plant
Constructor used for creating an Accessory Object for RETRIEVAL operations hence, the inclusion of itemID
Plant(String, String, double, int, String, String, String) - Constructor for class model.Plant
Constructor used for creating an Accessory Object for INSERTION operations hence, the absence of itemID
PlantCrud - Class in crud
The PlantCrud class provides methods for performing CRUD (Create, Retrieve, Update, Delete) operations in the Product Table Specifically, this class provides methods for Plants of type Plant
PlantCrud() - Constructor for class crud.PlantCrud
Constructs an PlantCrud object used for CRUD operations on Plant items
ProductCrud - Class in crud
The ProductCrud class provides methods for performing CRUD (Create, Retrieve, Update, Delete) operations in the Product Table
ProductCrud() - Constructor for class crud.ProductCrud
Constructs a ProductCrud object
productPanel() - Method in class view.GrowingPains
Creates the productPanel
ProductPanel - Class in view
ProductPanel extends JPanel, holds all information related to each individual product when selected Makes use of a boxLayout and allows the user to interact with the product information and add the product to their cart
ProductPanel(String, String, double, Cart) - Constructor for class view.ProductPanel
Constructs a new ProductPanel and initialises components and the customers Cart
